content.title: CLEwebinars.com
description: Get even more CLE credit from your Justia Connect Pro Membership! In addition to the CLE credit available to Pros for your attendance at select Justia Webinars, Justia Connect members can also save 20% on California CLE from CLEwebinars.com. Attorneys can also claim credit for these webinars in nearly a dozen other states via reciprocity.

content.title: Lifestyle Savings
description: Ready to get new computers for your office? Justia Connect members can save up to 40% on new HP consumer electronics and up to 50% off of weekly deals.
